setup.title: Emergency Mode
setup.description: Is your test approaching fast? Feeling overwhelmed? Activate Emergency Mode to get a focused study plan based on your available time.
setup.selectDaysAndHours: Select the number of days and hours to activate the mode.
setup.remainingDaysLabel: How many days are left until the exam
setup.hoursPerDayLabel: How many hours can you study per day
setup.needToSelect: You need to specify the number of days remaining and the number of study hours per day to activate Emergency Mode.
setup.hoursLabel: How many hours can you study now?
setup.focusAreasLabel: Which areas do you want to focus on?
setup.reasonPlaceholder: e.g., My test is in 3 days and I need to focus on my weaknesses.
setup.sessionStartedToast: Emergency session started! Let's get to work.
setup.validation_minHours: You must study for at least 1 hour.
setup.validation_minFocusAreas: Please select at least one area to focus on.

session.activateQuietMode: Do you want to activate quiet mode for better focus?
session.stillConfusedMessage: Still confused? Need extra support? Share your situation and request a suggestion.
session.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
session.sessionCompleteMessage: Great work! You've completed your emergency study session.
